fields.name: AlternativeMediaId
fields.description: Alternative Media ID of this Streaming Locator

fields.name: ContentKeys
fields.description: The ContentKeys used by this Streaming Locator.

fields.name: Created
fields.description: The creation time of the Streaming Locator.

fields.name: DefaultContentKeyPolicyName
fields.description: Name of the default ContentKeyPolicy used by this Streaming Locator.

fields.name: EndTime
fields.description: The end time of the Streaming Locator.

fields.name: Filters
fields.description: A list of asset or account filters which apply to this streaming locator

fields.name: StartTime
fields.description: The start time of the Streaming Locator.

fields.name: StreamingLocatorId
fields.description: The StreamingLocatorId of the Streaming Locator.

fields.name: StreamingPolicyName
fields.description: Name of the Streaming Policy used by this Streaming Locator. Either specify the name of Streaming Policy you created or use one of the predefined Streaming Policies. The predefined Streaming Policies available are: 'Predefined_DownloadOnly', 'Predefined_ClearStreamingOnly', 'Predefined_DownloadAndClearStreaming', 'Predefined_ClearKey', 'Predefined_MultiDrmCencStreaming' and 'Predefined_MultiDrmStreaming'
